metadata.description: At head of title: Société des amis de la liberté et de l'égalité, séante aux ci-devant Jacobins, Saint-Honoré, a Paris. Du 26 mars 1793, l'an 2me de la République française
On the death of Louis XVI and other matters

Martin & Walter IV 2: 16832 (which specifies: Adresses des députés des sociétés populaires de Digne, Manosque, Arles et Strasbourg) [edition 1: first line on p.14: "Nous ne doutons pas que parmi vous]
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained, and/or loose pages.
